name: (unfinished test)
description:
A game made for GitD#102

GOAL: To survive for as long as you can by defeating invisible enemy submarines.

CONTROL: Mouse clicks

MECHANICS: By clicking on sections of the radar, you will command your submarine to rotate towards a direction and perform an ability. The radar sections are:

1. Inner ring = proximity mine: Explodes when an enemy comes close
2. Middle ring = Torpedo: essentially a big and slow bullet
3. Outer ring = Flare: Reveals enemy submarines

WEEP: finish this game, at the moment you have unlimited ammo with zero cool down, which makes this game impossible to lose.
